original: intros n v H. destruct n. - unfold vec_sum, vec_zero. apply vec_pos_ext. intros p. rewrite vec_zero_spec. intros H'. discriminate H'. - specialize (vec_pos_ext nat n v (vec_zero n) v_zero) as E. apply E. intros p. rewrite vec_zero_spec. intros H'. apply vec_plus_is_zero in H'. destruct H' as [H1 H2]. rewrite H1. rewrite vec_zero_plus. rewrite vec_zero_spec. apply Eqdep_dec.UIP_dec. apply Nat.eq_dec.
